title: Hi, I'm looking for a typeface similar to the one in the picture
content:

Thanks so much for the help

comments.content:
I don’t think you’ll get an exact match because that looks hand-painted.

- Lex
yes, I thought so too, but i’m willing to settle for an acceptable substitute for now in lieu of drawing my own character set. Heh.
